product_name: REI Autumn Embossed Knee-High Socks - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a fun, eye-catching pattern, the REI Autumn Embossed socks keep your feet cozy thanks to knee-high coverage and soft, breathable merino wool. REI Autumn Embossed sock bottoms are padded with lightweight terry; legs and tops of feet are a slim flat-knit. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors. Nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex provides stretch to improve fit. Flat toe seams prevent chafing; machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a fun, eye-catching pattern, the REI Autumn Embossed socks keep your feet cozy thanks to knee-high coverage and soft, breathable merino wool.
